thread.title: Google Drive, Google Docs crash, everyone on deadline freaks out
thread.title_full: Google Drive, Google Docs crash, everyone on deadline freaks out | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Google Drive, Google Docs crash, everyone on deadline freaks out
text:
For Google Drive and Google Doc users Friday, a disruption in service meant a late start to the weekend.
Apparently there were a lot of people fervently working to meet a Friday afternoon deadline, and found themselves locked out of their precious Google documents, which includes word processing, spreadsheet and presentation tools.
Google addressed the problem on Twitter around 3 p.m. EST.
Looks like something's up with Docs - but fear not, we’re on it & you’ll be editing again in no time. Stay tuned here!
— Google Docs (@googledocs) October 9, 2015 Many people reported regaining functionality within about two hours, but losing that crucial part of Friday afternoon left many office staff in a state of panic.
At 5:45 p.m. EST, Google Docs gave the all clear.
Docs is all clear. Thanks for letting us know, and for staying with us.
— Google Docs (@googledocs) October 9, 2015 But by then, the damage had been done.
[ View the story "Google Docs, Drive go down, Internet freaks out" on Storify ]
